title: “Curb Cut” means a small solid (usually concrete) ramp that slopes down from the top surface of a side walk or footpath to the surface of an adjoining street
clause_text: “Curb Cut” means a small solid (usually concrete) ramp that slopes down from the top surface of a side walk or footpath to the surface of an adjoining street. It is designed for ease of access for pedestrians, bicyclists and differently abled people.
